text: Henry Weston (1534–1592) was a sixteenth century MP: firstly for Petersfield; then Surrey; and finally Petersfield again. A son of Sir Francis Weston, who was executed for an alleged dalliance with Anne Boleyn, he resided at Sutton Place in Surrey."The House of Commons, 1509–1558, Volume 1" Bindoff, S.T. p199: London; Secker & Warburg; 1982 ==References== Category:1534 births Category:1592 deaths Category:People from Surrey Category:16th-century English people Category:English MPs 1553 (Mary I) Category:English MPs 1571
title: Henry Weston (politician)
